Reviews.Title: “Lovely little motel on the bay side”
Reviews.Author: Christal W
Reviews.Content: We originally booked for two nights and ended up staying for five. The people here at the hotel are all very nice, the room is nice and clean. Anything you need they bring right to you. Don't expect your little travel and shampoos, bring your own. This is an old family run hotel. The pool is awesome and you are a block from the beach. Price is just right. We are looking forward to coming back again.

Reviews.Title: “Great experience - Except for the $1,500 damage to my car.”
Reviews.Author: 1fJef
Reviews.Content: My love and I took the top floor suite for an overnight stay. Although the Maridel is chock full of vintage era furnishings our experience was that it was clean and comfortable, but quite possibly in a crime strewn area that may require more detail, security, and safe procedure for their guest's parking area. Most disappointing was the owner's, Nancy and Paul, lack of attention to the destruction of our 1994 Fleetwood Brougham while parked on their property where Paul had directed us to park. "You can just leave it parked in front there since you are just staying the night", Paul said the day we checked in. Little did we suspect that the area was so dangerous. Had we known we would have parked our car in the secured lot with the rest of the guest's vehicles. Things happen in life and business. I am a business man. I know. I also know when a little common courtesy and at least an acknowledgment of how a patron's misfortune while being served by a business can go a long way toward's good relations and a better rating then what I am giving this motel. There was no offer of compensation for the damages to our beautiful classic car. No offer to compensate us for being up until 4AM cleaning glass out of our car at a distant 24hour Walmart so we could tape up the gaping hole in the back of our car where the window was - rain was forcasted for the day! There was no acknowledgment of their responsibility in directing us to park our car at the front of the motel exposed to pedestrian traffic. There was not even a simple 'sorry' offered up by Nancie as we checked out or by Paul as he zoomed past us with his head down like he didn't see us. Really?? Is it the Mariel's fault our car was damaged? Yes, I believe so. They know their neighborhood. Yet they directed us to park it in an exposed area. We did not have damage insurance on our car and these repairs; our return trip to Worcester County courts on Dec 4th to try to collect from the culprit Nicholas M Maher; our stay at another motel for that trip and the fuel will be out of our pocket. Some sort of acknowledgement and compensation would have been appropriate. Too bad the management of the Maridel is so poor. The old motel itself is suffering for it.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Well Priced, Great Service!”
Reviews.Author: Greg L
Reviews.Content: When we arrived, we tried to check in an hour early and they were happy to give us our room early. The check in went smoothly and quickly. When we got to our rooms we noticed that the room was outdated, but clean. We checked the sheets for bugs and stains and found none. The air conditioner worked good, as well as the microwave and refridgerator. We did notice that behind the curtains is a bar to hang towels or bathing suits and it smelled a little over there, but nothing noticeable if not standing back there. The bathroom was small and the shower was a little dirty, but nothing too unbearable. I also want to note that they do not include any extras, just the bare necessties, as far as toiletries--they only provide the towels, plastic cup and a few bars of soap, but nothing more. Inside the room, we could not hear any loud talking or televisions. Good location for convention center and other restaurants. For the money, this motel is a great place to stay! If you are visiting OC on a budget like we were, stay here!

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: Misty A
Reviews.Content: The housekeeping staff kept the place very clean.None of the usual horror stories of places not having hot water,or black hairs in the shower.The air conditioner worked great.It was everything I expected for what I paid and it was clean.If your looking for the Ritz this isn't it BUT if you want a cool,clean room for a great price,this is it.Very quiet too!

Reviews.Title: “you get what you pay for..and we didn't get much.”
Reviews.Author: donhol27
Reviews.Content: We decided to stay at this motel based on the price of the room. It was much cheaper than mostly all of the other hotels in Ocean City. The look of the building is very old and outdated. There are power lines and power transformers right behind the building, so when you are in the pool, that is the view you have. The pool was on the smaller side, but was clean. The cushions on the pool lounge chairs were very dirty, but we just removed them. Check in went smoothly and the front desk staff were friendly and helpful. The room left a lot to be desired. It was quite small and had a bit of an odor. The carpet was very dirty and after only a few minutes of walking around on it, my daughters feet were black on the bottom. I had to wear my flip flops the whole time in the room. I also found hair one one of the bath towels that was hanging up. With all of that being said, the motel is a 5 minute walk to the beach and was priced much less than pretty much every place else in the area. Would I stay there again? No, but if you are traveling on a budget and don't mind less than good, than it is for you. I will pay the extra $100 for better accommodations next time.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Low cost, and Close to Convention Ctr”
Reviews.Author: threeMainCoons
Reviews.Content: This small motel is clean and very very close to the convention center. I am not able to walk far and I was able to walk across the parking lot to the center. If you are attending an event at the center and want to be right there this is the place for you. Very basic accomadations, nothing fancy, and a small bathroom but the people are friendly, there is a small pool and a resturant within steps of the motel that serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. I would recommend this motel if you want to save money and want a clean, quiet place to stay. This was a business trip so I can't comment on access to the beach but I saw others who were coming and going daily to the beach by car. Call and ask Fred (very friendly owner) about proximity to the beach. Comfortable beds.

Reviews.Title: “The Maridel rocks!!!always a pleasure to stay here♥”
Reviews.Author: teamkisses
Reviews.Content: we have been staying at the maridel for the past ten years.Both Paul & Nancy the owners are pleasant and accommodating, they run a very clean motel ( in all ten years we have never seen a bug or stained sheets)across the street from the beach and very convenient to near by attractions and bus transportation.the kiddos love their pool,each room has a refrige,coffee maker,microwave and hairdryer. my preteen enjoyed using her newly bought laptop with their wifi in the room to keep in touch with her friends.we continue to recommend this motel to our friends & family♥

Reviews.Title: “Choose this Motel...I have been there many times!”
Reviews.Author: jadaza
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this motel many times. I am travler....The motel is small and yes there is no elevator so being on the top floor is not a plus, however it is the best value in OC. The pool is clean, the rooms are clean, if you are looking for a 5 star then do not stay here and write bad reviews. This is a budget friendly matel close to the action of OC. The supermarket is next door, dough rollers is next to the motel, ritas and the bus stop are at the front door as well. The staff are very friendly and do everything they can to help you enjoy your stay. The maid staff is very friendly and prompt and would not steal from you. I have left money on the counter and came back and it is still there...wont happen at the 5 star resorts.....If you are looking for a clean, safe, centrally located place to stay in OC then you have found it here. Denise B.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Economy Motel”
Reviews.Author: BeachcomberUsa
Reviews.Content: Service was great! My room was held for my late night arrival time on a Holiday weekend. My room was comfortable and spacious. The location was ideal for bikng to and from the Boardwalk each morning. The pool looked very clean and clear, although the weather was too cool for swimming. The Wireless Internet was flawless the entire weekend. What I liked best was the easy access to and from the adjacent parking lot. Also, a local restaurant and grocery store were right next door.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Smell”
Reviews.Author: poca1313
Reviews.Content: The beds were comfortable, the bathroom was clean. Had a hair dryer which was a plus. The pool was clean the kids enjoyed it. Supermarket is a very short walk and dough roller was right in front. The view was ok, you could see the bay and the bridge. BUT the room REAKED of cat urine. It says they do not let pets in there so whatever the smell was smelled horrible. We sprayed lysol heavily in the room but it didnt' help. It wasn't even one of those smells where if your in the room long enough you get used to it. The carpet also smelled like horrible mildew. And if those pictures on this website was really a room there, it ddin't look anything like the one we stayed in. Our room did not have nice paneling, it was straight brick painted white. and our carpet was stained. Oh yeah, it says internet but we weren't able to pick up a signal at all.

Reviews.Title: “never again”
Reviews.Author: pinknpretty_sparkles
Reviews.Content: cockroaches, stained sheets and bedspreads.stained walls,dirty.maid did not change the sheets the 3 nights we were there.several steps to haul your luggage,no elevator.no closet.just a filthy place.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty Good Place”
Reviews.Author: Daniel0228
Reviews.Content: I just got back from my stay in OCMD and stayed at the Maridel Motel. I enjoyed my stay there. When we arrived to the motel my friend and I thought the motel looked like a DUMP from the outside. When we got into our room, we were pleasantly surprised that it was actually pretty decent. I did not like that we had to cross the main road to get to the beach. I also did not enjoy that the convention center wires and such were pretty much our view. The price for our stay was not bad at all. I would recommend to friends if they are looking for a pretty good place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great Price, Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: vaca-lovers
Reviews.Content: We called stating that we were going to be checking in late (appx 1am). The front desk was there and very helpful and friendly @ 1am. The owner called while we were checking in to see if we arrived or not (which i thought was good). The room had 2 beds and was big enough for a family for 4 but is comfy for 2 ppl. We also booked 2 nights at 2 different times online-- resulting in us being placed in 2 different rooms; but once again the front desk was very helpful and was able to give us the same room 2 nights in a row. Showers were clean and there were NO BUGS! it was a few feet and the bay and to the beach as well. We will book there again and recommmend it to anyone 110%!

Reviews.Title: “good deal”
Reviews.Author: swayo
Reviews.Content: The place is small and dated but clean...if you just need a room to sleep and go to the beach all day and go out at night...its perfect and in a great location...... 9 blocks from seacrets, one block from beach, bank of america and food store right next door, on the bay restaurant across the street was great. The pool was small but spotless, air conditioning and mini fridge worked great as well...not the type of place to bring a first date to impress but more for people who would rather save a few bucks on accommodations and rather spend it on the great night life and dining in the area...

Reviews.Title: “Hated This Cheap Hotel”
Reviews.Author: kristacorrinne
Reviews.Content: This cheap motel was horrible. They have the lamest rules for you during your stay. I had a friend come over to visit me from the hotel she was staying at and they have cameras in the hotel hallways so the front desk calls your room everytime a new person comes into your room to find out what is going on. Also, We had 2 couples coming on this trip and one extra person. We didnt know they only allowed 4 people to a room and they ended up telling the 5th person in our room he had to sleep in his car or find another hotel to stay at! The manager there is a creep & was staring all my friends up and down. This place is not somewhere I would recomend you to stay at. I will neverrrrr go to this motel again. thanks.

Reviews.Title: “No frills value”
Reviews.Author: SavvySue
Reviews.Content: Value priced hotel right next to the convention center. This motel doesn't look like much from the outside, but the rooms are very clean (dated but serviceable), the staff is accomodating and friendly. The a/c unit worked great and wasn't too loud. I would recommend this motel to anyone looking for a clean, comfortable, no frills place to stay at a bargain price. Sue, MD

HotelInfo.Name: Maridel Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 101 42nd St, Ocean City, MD 21842
